articles.author: Peter Allen, Lauren Lewis, Reuters
articles.title: May Day mayhem: Dozens of police officers injured after violent clashes in Europe - Daily Mail
articles.description: German police said 30 officers were injured when protests in Berlin turned violent on Saturday and Belgian police turned water canons and tear gas on an anti-lockdown party in Brussels.
articles.content:
Dozens of police officers were injured during mass protests in Germany, France, Belgium, Italy, and Spain, as May Day demonstrations turned violent. 
Around 30,000 protesters took to the streets dur… [+16314 chars]

articles.description: South Africa's Rugby World Cup winner Handre Pollard made his first appearance since September as Montpellier reached the European Challenge Cup final on Saturday.
